name: Snowy Day
description:
Snowy Day is a small, christmas platform game in which you must get through different levels in a search for stolen christmas presents.

Journey through frozen valleys and pick up the presents, stolen by the evil snowmen, so that Santa Claus can bring Christmas back for children all over the world.

Snowy Day is a small college project developed by students at Universidade de A Coruña.

CONTROLS

-> Use ARROW KEYS or WASD to move / SPACE to shoot

Reload your gun on the snow mounds!

The snowmen will turn into snow mounds once you defeat them
